name: Frogger3D (Bensho)
description:
This is basic Frogger remade in 3D. I made this just to practice Unity and it's really bad. The movement didn't translate to 3D well, my models are horrible, and while trying to make the camera less spazzy I made it way worse. 

Also, the goal is a coin and not a fly as it was in the original game because I didn't want to model a voxel fly because that sounds hard.

It's not finished, I just don't want to keep working on it. I hope you enjoy :)

Controls:

Use WSAD or Arrow keys to move

R to restart

Escape to quit

Goal:

Reach the end and touch the coin five times, once in each spot.
